topic.title: Obtain an IP Address from a DHCP Server
topic.shortdesc: You can configure to automatically obtain an IP address from a DHCP server running in your network.

p.note: The the IP address assigned to the PBX may vary every time the PBX is started up. We suggest that your configure a static IP address for the PBX.

ol.li: Go to Settings Systems Network Basic Settings .
In the Hostname field, enter a host name.
In the Mode field, select Single mode.
Select DHCP to obtain an IP address from a DHCP server.

Click Save and reboot the PBX to take effect.
You can check the IP address of the PBX from your router.
